plot outline: A journey throughout Chidamabara Krishnan, whose friends call him 'Chikki', takes a sudden train journey after seeing his dream girl. A romantic journey from Chennai to Nagerkoil is the only time available to win her heart. Can 12 hours of a train journey be enough to win the heart of his dream girl?
title: Chikkiku Chikkikichu
plot: A journey throughout Chidamabara Krishnan, whose friends call him 'Chikki', takes a sudden train journey after seeing his dream girl. A romantic journey from Chennai to Nagerkoil is the only time available to win her heart. Can 12 hours of a train journey be enough to win the heart of his dream girl?
